meta.name: viewport

link.title: Cape Cod Lighthouse Charter School | HOME

meta.name: description
meta.content: Founded in 1995, Cape Cod Lighthouse Charter School is a Commonwealth Charter School. We seek to provide a supportive and challenging learning environment for middle school students. Admissions are held by lottery each year.
Cape Cod Lighthouse Charter School | HOME

Founded in 1995, Cape Cod Lighthouse Charter School is a Commonwealth Charter School. We seek to provide a supportive and challenging learning environment for middle school students. Admissions are held by lottery each year.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Lighthouse, cape cod, cape cod lighthouse charter, cape cod lighthouse charter school, charter, harwich, middle school

img.alt: black and white sketch of lighthouse

span.span: Founded in 1995, Cape Cod Lighthouse Charter School is a Commonwealth Charter School. We seek to provide a supportive and challenging learning environment for middle school students, where teachers foster intellectual development and academic achievement in an atmosphere that celebrates learning as a lifelong pleasure.
Admissions is by lottery, which will be held at the of January and the beginning February.
